item.title: Creative Explainer Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
Creative Explainer Video Creator Wanted!!!

PORTFOLIO IS A MUST!!!

We're searching for a creative and tech-savvy Explainer Video Creator to join our team. Your role will involve crafting engaging and informative videos that break down complex ideas into simple, easy-to-understand visuals and narratives. Ideal candidates will have a strong background in graphic design, animation, and video editing, with a knack for storytelling and a keen eye for detail. If you're passionate about turning information into captivating visual stories and have experience with video production tools, we'd love to see your work.

This project requires you to work with zoom screen sharing.  If you are not ok with working with zoom screen sharing, please do not apply.

Work Hours 11:00AM to 4:00PM PST (Los Angeles Time) Monday-Friday (Weekend Optional)

Hourly Range: $3.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 03:55 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Motion Graphics, Video Commercial, 2D Animation, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Animation
Skills: Video Production, Motion Graphics, Video Commercial, 2D Animation, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Animation
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Portuguese language, video presenter for 5-minute-long instructional video - Upwork
item.description:
Presenter should be a native Portuguese speaker from Brazil or Portugal.

You will provide approximately 1 minute of video and 4 minutes of audio for this 5-minute video.

Tasks are
1. Translate the script in the spreadsheet to Portuguese
2. Provide the audio and video clips

Video clips
6 video clips, full HD (1920x1080)
MP4 files are preferred. MOV is also okay.
Preferred orientation is indicated in the script spreadsheet. However, if you are equipped for only landscape or portrait, then you can provide all clips in either landscape or portrait.

Audio clips:
There are at least least 12 audio clips. (Audio for long items, such as item 17, can be split into multiple files.)
File type: MP3 files.

Delivery time:
By July 1 is preferred.
By July 12 is okay if you need extra time.

Please include one or more video examples which include you in a presentation role.
The listed budget is flexible, depending on your experience and sample video.

Video for this presentation
The near-final video in English, which is missing one clip, is here (96 MB)
https://credvue2024a.blob.core.windows.net/site-content/Profiles-English-NOT-FINISHED.mp4

The final video in Spanish can be viewed here
704x396 (44 MB) : https://credvue2024a.blob.core.windows.net/site-content/video_profiles_es_0396.mp4
1280x720 (83 MB): https://credvue2024a.blob.core.windows.net/site-content/video_profiles_es_0720.mp4
1920x1080 (160 MB): https://credvue2024a.blob.core.windows.net/site-content/video_profiles_es_1080.mp4

Budget: $170
Posted On: June 17, 2024 03:51 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Explainer Video
Skills: Explainer Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Podcast Introduction Creation - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled professional who can create an engaging and captivating introduction for our podcast. The introduction should represent the essence of our podcast and leave a lasting impression on our listeners.

Skills required:
- Proficiency in audio editing software
- Strong storytelling and scriptwriting skills
- Knowledge of different music genres and sound effects
- Ability to capture the tone and theme of a podcast

Size: Small
Duration: due in 3 days
Expertise: Intermediate


Budget: $20
Posted On: June 17, 2024 03:47 UTC
Category: Audio Production
Skills:Audio Editing, Audio Production, Podcast, Video Editing
Skills: Audio Editing, Audio Production, Podcast, Video Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor Needed For SaaS Marketing/Social Video - Upwork
item.description:
We're a leading workforce SaaS company and we need a kickass video editor to create a short video for our channels and socials.

***The Brief***
We recently conducted some proprietary research that we are releasing as part of a PR campaign.

We need your expertise to create a video that turns the research we have into an engaging video using graphics and animations.

***The Assets***
You will be provided with:
- Voice over
- Piece to camera
- Script
- Graphics
- Storyboard

***Your Job***
- Turn what we provide plus your expert animation and production skills into a super engaging video.
- Create one 90-120sec video for Youtube, FB, LinkedIn
- Create multiple shorter 15-30sec videos

***Examples***
Checkout the examples at https://www.viralcuts.co/#examples to see the style we need

Please include the word onion in the first line of your proposal.


Hourly Range: $18.00-$32.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 03:43 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Videography, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Videography, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Amazon Product Opinion Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for advice from real customers to improve our product and service. Our products are crawl space vapor barriers. You need capture images and videos of our Amazon products with your mobile phone. No complete skills are required, simply take3-5shots with your phone, and shoot a short 30-135 seconds showcase.

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 17, 2024 03:41 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:Amazon, Feedback & Satisfaction Survey, User Experience, Photo Editing, Video Editing
Skills: Amazon, Feedback & Satisfaction Survey, User Experience, Photo Editing, Video Editing
Country: China
